descriptionHtml:
This mod add stand-alone  Elf follower.Lynette is remarkable for light Armor and One hand.She　has a baby face but she is about two hundred years old.This mod is set for Legendary mode so if you use another mode game　balance might be destructed.

-Location
Drunken huntsman
